text: 16.19 Ais 51.17, Jer 25.15-16, Lep 14.8-10, 17.18, 18.5 Monmon awl yɨbɨl anɨb ak dɨl, taun Babilon ak bu agɨl, asɨk kɨd omɨŋal nokom lɨl, taun man keke okok mɨdupsek, kal tap okok pɨgju kosɨl masɨl gak. Gak anɨb ak, God nop mɨlɨk yɨbɨl yapek, Babilon binɨb gɨlak ak sawl ma gɨl, kɨlop ñɨg sɨlek kɨnag tub alaŋ aplan jakak ak, ñek ñɨŋɨlak.
